Module c482performanceassessment
Package c482performanceassessment.controllers

Class BaseFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • c482performanceassessment.controllers.BaseFormController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainFormController, PartFormController, ProductFormController
    public abstract class BaseFormController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for reducing redundancy between the three main controllers by abstracting commonly used functions. FUTURE ENHANCEMENT - Make certain functions such as deleting parts or products more generic across controllers. to reduce the verbosity of controllers
    Author:
    Brady Bassett

      • partSearch

        protected javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> partSearch​(javafx.scene.control.TextField partSearch)
        Search bar functionality for all Part tables. LOGIC ERROR - when partSearch was called, I would only call searchParts from the inventory class, but when associatedParts were being searched, I would return the parts list from the inventory class. I fixed this by creating a static class SearchParts which only includes the searchParts function, and returned the appropriate list based on if it was a parts search or an associatedParts search.
        Parameters:
        partSearch - String user is searching for
        Returns:
        returns a list of all parts matching the provided string if there is at least one part in partsRetrieved, or returns the entire parts list if no characters are present in partSearch

      • productSearch

        protected javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> productSearch​(javafx.scene.control.TextField productSearch)
        Search bar functionality for all Product tables.
        Parameters:
        productSearch - String user is searching for
        Returns:
        returns a list of all products matching the provided string if there is at least one product in productsRetrieved, or returns the entire products list if no characters are present in productSearch

      • partTableInit

        protected void partTableInit​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable,
                             javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,​java.lang.Integer> partId,
                             javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,​java.lang.String> partName,
                             javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,​java.lang.Integer> partInventoryLevel,
                             javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,​java.lang.Double> partPrice,
                             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> displayedParts)
        Initializes the parts tables using the provided displayedParts list and its displayed values.
        Parameters:
        partTable - TableView of parts that will be displayed
        partId - TableColumn for partId
        partName - TableColumn for partName
        partInventoryLevel - TableColumn for partInventoryLevel
        partPrice - TableColumn for partPrice
        displayedParts - Part observable list of all parts that are to be displayed

        protected void productTableInit​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Product> productTable,

        Parameters:

        productId - TableColumn for productId
        productName - TableColumn for productName

      • saveValidation

        protected void saveValidation​(javafx.scene.control.TextField name,
                              javafx.scene.control.TextField inventory,
                              javafx.scene.control.TextField price,
                              javafx.scene.control.TextField maxInventory,
                              javafx.scene.control.TextField minInventory)
        Function to validate if it is possible to save an added or modified item. If any of the provided TextFields are empty throw a NullPointerException with an error message describing which TextField is empty. And if the min inventory value is less than or equal to the max inventory value, or if the inventory value is less than the min inventory value or greater than the max inventory value, throw an IllegalArgumentException with a message depending on the case.
        Parameters:
        name - TextField for item name
        inventory - TextField for item inventory
        price - TextField for item price
        maxInventory - TextField for max item inventory
        minInventory - TextField for min item inventory
